@sciman
Megabit(Mb)/8=megabyte(MB)
So 20/8 = 2.5

You can't download faster than 2.5 MB/s

@sciman
I can't help you there, sorry. I am using Vuze. While downloading, limit your upload speed to around 90 kB/s, but I'm not 100% sure on that.. I'm on a 24/1Mb (DL/UL) connection and I have limited my upload speed to 100 kB/s.
Make sure you have forwarded a port if you are using a router.

I would recommend that you switch to Vuze because its easy to use. :)
Hope it helped!
